data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro - Creators Version - Build 15063.413 / Vers. 1703 / 64x
data.actual_result: The number isn't aligned inside the box. (Also doesn't appear like emoji. It appears like a alphanumerical character but that's part is right).
data.expected_result: The emoji should appear properly (with the number aligned inside the box).
data.short_description: The emoji 0️⃣ (and any other keycap emoji) doesn't work properly on voice channel titles.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a keycap emoji, like this one 0️⃣ (from emojipedia or any other site like this one (\0⃣) will not work). - Put it on the voice channel title. - Apply it and see what's happen.
